short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to capture web content and share via the NetSocial sharing platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is used to create social media posts from the content being browsed. To use the extension, install it, then browse to some interesting content 

(e.g. Google Play Store (https://play.google.com/store) )

 then activate the plugin and log in to the plugin using the credentials below. Once logged in you can then create social media posts to save to the NetSocial platform for distribution.
